title: /u/sigafoo on How much input on balance changes made should come from the 6's community, if any at all?
content: I think sixes could work on payload as it currently stands, but not with its current class meta. Prolander just has 1 more player, and we actually have a problem that we're actively looking into solutions for. It's that the offense is too effective and often maps happen too quickly.   I've played a couple times with our ruleset (with 6 people) on payload and it seems to have worked fine so far. I think it's more of a format issue and less of a map issue.     from overview for sigafoo /r/truetf2/comments/8nz1p7/how_much_input_on_balance_changes_made_should/e00gu27/  via IFTTT
contentWithMarkup:
I think sixes could work on payload as it currently stands, but not with its current class meta. Prolander just has 1 more player, and we actually have a problem that we're actively looking into solutions for. It's that the offense is too effective and often maps happen too quickly.

I've played a couple times with our ruleset (with 6 people) on payload and it seems to have worked fine so far. I think it's more of a format issue and less of a map issue.



from overview for sigafoo /r/truetf2/comments/8nz1p7/how_much_input_on_balance_changes_made_should/e00gu27/
via IFTTT
